text: cng klaw theid (muhammad) wa phwk than cng na ma sung brrda phyan khxng phwk than thi ca yun wa thæ cring hallxh di thrng ham sing ni læw tha phwk khea(pen phyan) yunyan cea k xya yunyan kab phwk khea dwy læa xya tam khwam khır fıta khxng brrda phu thi ptiseth xongkar thanghlay khxng rea læa brrda phu thi mi sraththa tx pk lok læa khna deiywkan phwk khea k hı sing xun theatheiym kab phracea khxng phwk khea
